title: Vice President Joe Biden (Extended Cut) | Colbert Classic
description:
Then-Vice-President Joe Biden opened up to Stephen Colbert in an interview on Colbert’s third episode of The Late Show on CBS in 2015. It was a frank and sincere discussion—they talked about Biden’s relationship with his son, his feelings about running for president, and staying focused on what you believe in while in office.
